name: Markdown file
code: Linux and MacOS  , open terminal > navigator to the folder you want to save the file in > type ' touch filename.md ' > open the file in your favorite text editor and start writing your markdown code. Windows  , open command prompt > navigator to the folder you want to save the file in  > type ' echo.>filename.md '> open the file in your favorite text editor and start writing your markdown code.
explaination:
Markdown is a lightweight markup language for creating formatted text using a plain-text editor. John Gruber and Aaron Swartz created Markdown in 2004 as a markup language that is appealing to human readers in its source code form. Markdown is widely used in blogging, instant messaging, online forums, collaborative software, documentation pages, and readme files.
Read more

name: Heading
explaination: The code provided above creates an HTML element of 'h1', feel free the customize the code to meet your different prefferances to the  h2,h3,h4,h5,h6 ## Heading 2  ### Heading 3  #### Heading 4  ##### Heading 5  ###### Heading 6. Note that the number of '#' determines the size of the heading.

name: Link
explaination: The code provided above creates a link to a website, feel free to customize the code to meet your different prefferances by changing the text in the square brackets to your desired text and the link in the round brackets to your desired link.
